phrases: Send the lost promises to the stars
My memories will not fade away
yotsuba no clover sagashinagara kimi no kao
I steal a glance at you as we look for four-leaf clovers,
chirari nusumi mite wa me o sorasu
yasashii ame wa furu watashitachi no ue ni
The gentle rain falls above our heads
surechigau hito no kazu dake dramatic ni naru no
as it becomes as dramatic as the number of people passing by
I wonder if we will ever be able to
itsuka mata aeru hi ga kurukashira
reunite with those precious things that were broken
The scars that were left behind will not go away
Do you want him to come back?
And you do not know when he is coming back?
And his room is filled with Matsumoto meters?
Note: a reference to Leiji Matsumoto's Galaxy Express 999.
I still cannot believe it myself.
What is he going to do in America?
I am only interested in his room.
When I put it into words, the reality of the situation wore off more and more...
And even I started wondering if this was really happening.
On top of that, he suddenly went off to America and we do not even know when he is coming back?
Well, he did disappear randomly a lot, so maybe this is expected of him.
What about his tuition and visa?
We need to pay rent to our landlord in person.
What about his notice of absence for school?
Oh, but I guess he might not need one since he only has his graduate thesis left.
I could not gather anything from the expression on her small and still feverish face.
Do you want him to come back?
I wonder what that was supposed to mean...
Why did he ask me something like that?
Will Morita-san come back right away if I told him that I wanted him to?
If that is the case, that question is not for me.
Hagu-chan, do you want Morita-san to come back?
Hey, what good will asking her that do?
I do not want him to.
I do not want him to come back.
I think it is good to keep trying until you have tried everything you have wanted to do.
What kind of response did I want from her?
Her response was not that of a delicate girl in love.
It was more straightforward, more powerful...
I did not notice that Hagu-chan liked Morita-san at all.
I lived with her for a year and did not notice.
What should I make of my slowness as a girl?
I think that is one of your good points, Yamada.
I feel that you are just saying that I am insensitive.
I am not going to help you make your pottery anymore!
All right, I think it is pretty good.
A construction design office even needs to obtain the ceramics that will be displayed in a restaurant's lobby?
Yeah, when we take on the entire project like this time.
No, it is fun... and educational.
Next up are two beige-colored 38 cm ones.
They will be big, so we should make them by hand.
These things would be pretty expensive if we had to buy them.
I will make sure to ply money from them to pay you.
But I will apologize beforehand if we end up paying you with items.
Like a small fountain that is no longer being used.
Or a large table for a model room.
Or a replica of Venus de Milo.
If I can ask for anything...
I will make sure to get money for you.
If Hagu-chan has been thinking about Morita-san but has not realized that it is love...
Since depending on how you look at it, it might also mean that she does not have the mental capacity to consider a relationship.
And on top of everything, we are talking about Morita-san.
Yeah, he tears anyone who gets serious about him to shreds.
It kind of pisses me off when you say it, Mayama!
I really might have stepped on something I should not have.
The fact that you are apologizing pisses me off even more!
How about the one from Tenka Ippin?
That man is like a runaway train with his overflowing talent.
I have already been enlightened regarding the fact that it is best for us to let him do as he pleases.
But America all of a sudden?
That man does not pay attention to anything other people say.
But... he really paid attention to your works.
He said, I have never seen anyone but myself make something that huge.
nandaka dou demo yoku natte gozen chuu sabotte shimatta
I did not really care, so I skipped the morning classes.
miesuita iiwake wo shitara yokei meittekita
Making poor excuses just made me more depressed.
kinou no yoru kanojo ga tabeta poteto chippusu no fukuro
The bag of chips she was eating last night
terebi wo minagara nondeta biiru mo sono mama teeburu ni...
and the beer she was drinking while watching the TV are still on the table.
saenai hibi da to wa omou
These days feel pretty dull to me,
though I think about various things.
denwa kurai yokose to kazoku wa iu
My family says, Cannot you at least call?,
hanaseru koto wa betsu ni nani mo nai kedo
but I do not really have anything to talk about.
tsumaranai to yoku kanojo wa iu
She says, I am bored a lot.
It is almost noon, I guess I should get going.
Her back as she poured all her heart into working on the canvas...
Morita-san's back as he was swinging the wood pick alone that night...
They are both in a world I cannot enter.
And... distance does not exist in that world.
I would rather have her brawl like usual and say that she wants him to come back soon.
It would have been far, far better.
I planted basil and beafsteak plants on my balcony in the beginning of summer.
They grew quickly under the summer sun.
But during one of the July typhoons, the tallest beefsteak plant...
My mother looked at the snapped beefsteak plant and said...
That will not return to normal, so tear it off where it broke.
If you do that, a new stem will grow from there and new leaves will grow from it.
But I could not help but hesitate...
They did not change at all after the stem snapped.
I still have a hard time believing that the person who drew this is right in front of me.
I wonder if these are the cherry blossoms from this year...
The ones we all saw at the park?
It might be that all the cherry blossoms she is seen in her life are meshed together.
And even though we were all looking at the same cherry blossoms...
Where in your body does such monstrous strength reside?
We will have to buy a new one.
Hagu-chan, did you wash your hands?
She is not working with clay today, so it should be okay.
Let us go see the fireworks, Hagu-chan!
We will put on yukata and geta, dress up, and eat caramel apples.
Yukata: a type of kimono worn in the summer; Geta: wooden sandals.
We will lend you a yukata.
It is going to be by the riverbank tonight, right?
It is sudden, but I wonder if Mayama-san will also make it...
He might not be able to come.
A party to celebrate the end of a job?
Oh, I guess it will not work out, then.
I will invite you again some other time.
So I hear that you are busy?
You do not need to go through all that trouble to come.
We are all having fun over here.
No, I will be there by 7:30!
Please call me on my cell phone.
I will be near the bridge by the levee!
Mayama says that he is coming.
She runs a kimono store in Kouenji.
I will be in your care today.
She really is small, is not she?
Now which one shall we wear?
How about this one for you, Ayumi?
Oh, but that is nice, too.
But is not that a little too mature, Aunt?
Something that is a little mature fits girls your age perfectly.
You need to show off your sexiness and get an iron grip on his heart!
Do not you have a man or two you want to emasculate?
I would love to go with this, Aunt!
Th-Then I will go with this!
Oh, you want to go with the sexy look, too?
Let us do our best, Hagu-chan!
But you two need to go take a bath first!
We will put on your yukata afterwards.
Go cleanse your bodies and get fired up!
There is no need for you to be fixated on the flower stems.
See, even if you choose one with good designs, it will match as long as the color does.
Now that it is come to this, we will pull out our last stop!
Please go borrow the one we made two years ago for Kayo-chan from the sushi restaurant!
I am sure that I will turn you into a real beauty!
Ayu, we will start with you!
Aunt Aki, do I really have to wrap this around me?
You have ample breasts, so if you do not put that on, they will sit prominently on the obi.
Obi: a wide belt worn with a kimono.
If you do not want to wrap the towel around you, would you rather put this bra on?
This is not romantic at all!
What, you are planning to take it off today?
I just need to wrap it around me, right?
Oh, you do not need to wrap it around yourself.
You do not have any curves.
Is not this a little too mature-looking?
Well then, I guess the problem is over here.
Ribbon obi and a goldfish pattern...
No matter how you look at it, it is for an elementary school student.
It fits her so well that it is almost scary.
I guess it cannot be helped.
I made this to sell at the store, but...
Here, I will give this to you.
And I will lend you this.
It is a hairpin I made from an obi stopper.
Rather, the main problem is the fact that it fits you that well.
You do not need to push yourself.
It is best to wear what fits you.
You are going to see the fireworks, Ayu?
Want to take some beef shish kebab with it?
I will add some fried chicken, too!
All right, take this roll sushi with you!
Wow, we got a lot of food.
Does this look good on me?
Mayama called and said that he will be here soon.
As expected from a man who hates being left out.
Does this really, really look good?
Do not I look weird with my forehead showing?
It really looks good on you, Ayu.
Yeah, I skipped out on the mahjong.
Wow, you have a lot of luggage.
I will carry it for you.
You look good in that yukata.
You look good in that yukata.
Wanting to hear just those words...
All for those words from no one but you.
I hoped that maybe your heart would tilt just a little bit towards me.
Why do I always end up dreaming?
Over and over, never getting tired of it, like a fool repeating the only thing he knows.
When I went out on the balcony a few days later...
the snapped beefsteak plant was writhing on the ground, unable to hold up its own weights.
It was just like my mom said.
I had no choice but to tear it off where it snapped.
There was no choice but to break it there and let it grow a new stem.
But I still become hopelessly confused.
Taken advantage of by his smiling face
kuchi ni shita sake ni aorarete, oh
Stimulated by the alcohol she drank
The tear that wells up when she is shown otherwise
ki ga sukkari sono ki ni natteru
She would already become all for it
Even if she tries to pretend that it was a dream
His paper tells a different story
The silvery summer's night she was picked up on
She is being constricted by a mistake that will not go away
Next episode: I touched her in my dream.
